column5: Our Cozy Room is equipped with two comfortable queen size beds, Spacious and Nice set , kitchenette with all set up to make your stay one of a kind. Laminate flooring cools in summer and warm and cozy in Winter. Besides having one of the best rooms of property, there is another big screen TV in living room connected to a DVR so you wont miss entertainment; you may watch while eating or relaxing.  A big all set up kitchen will be the perfect asset in case you like cooking.
